snippet.name: Custom Plugin
snippet.starttext:
<!-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Author 	 :	$${Author}
Date     :	$${DATE}
Description : 			
 $${Plugin Description}
		
Modification History:

----------------------------------------------------------------------->
<cfcomponent name="$${Plugin Name}" hint="$${Hint}" extends="coldbox.system.plugin" output="false">
  
    <!--- ************************************************************* --->
   
    <cffunction name="init" access="public" returntype="$${CURRENTFILE}" output="false">
		<cfargument name="controller" type="any" required="true">
		<cfscript>
  		super.Init(arguments.controller);
  		setpluginName("$${Plugin Name}");
  		setpluginVersion("$${Plugin Version}");
  		setpluginDescription("$${Plugin Description}");
  		return this;
		</cfscript>
	</cffunction>
    
	<!--- ************************************************************* --->
	
</cfcomponent>
